name: GetSKUseller
description:
Retrieves the details of a seller's SKU given a seller ID and the SKU ID in the seller's store. 

 > â„¹ This path is an updated version of `/api/catalog_system/pvt/skuseller/{sellerId}/{sellerSkuId}`.

## Response body example

```json
{
    "IsPersisted": true,
    "IsRemoved": false,
    "SkuSellerId": 102,
    "UpdateDate": "2021-04-12T20:06:59.413Z",
    "RequestedUpdateDate": null,
    "SellerStockKeepingUnitId": "71",
    "SellerId": "vtxkfj7352",
    "StockKeepingUnitId": 1,
    "IsActive": true
}
```

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

sellerId.description: ID that identifies the seller in the marketplace. It can be the same as the seller name or a unique number. Check the **Sellers management** section in the Admin to get the correct ID.

sellerSkuId.description: SKU ID in the seller's store.

$ul: **IsActive**: Defines if the SKU binding is active.
**IsPersisted**: Defines if the seller is persisted.
**IsRemoved**: Defines if the seller is removed.
**RequestedUpdateDate**: Date when an SKU binding update was requested for the last time, in UTC format.
**SellerId**: ID that identifies the seller in the marketplace. It can be the same as the seller name or a unique number. Check the **Sellers management** section in the Admin to get the correct ID.
**SkuSellerId**: SKU ID in the seller's store.
**StockKeepingUnitId**: SKU ID in the VTEX marketplace.
**UpdateDate**: Date when the SKU binding was updated for the last time, in UTC format.
